paragraphs.text: Manufacturers shall design products to allow data access by default.
Users must be informed about data generation and access rights.
Data holders shall make data available under fair, reasonable and non-discriminatory terms.
This includes sharing data with public sector bodies when necessary.
Artificial intelligence system means software developed with machine learning approaches.
High-risk AI systems include those used in biometric identification and law enforcement.
Prohibited AI practices include social scoring by governments and subliminal manipulation.
